title: Djokovic vs Berrettini live stream: how to watch Wimbledon Men's Final tennis free and from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: Serbian world number 1 could clinch his 20th Grand Slam title
article: History is within Novak Djokovic's grasp today as he looks to win his 20th Grand Slam title - a feat that would draw him level with Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal’s shared record.

Read on as we explain how to watch the Men's Singles Wimbledon tennis final online and get a Novak Djokovic vs Matteo Berrettini live stream wherever you are right now - including ways to see the match absolutely FREE.
Standing in the way of the World number one and defending champ is 25-year-old Matteo Berrettini.

The first Italian to reach the Men's Singles Final at the All England Club, Berrettini has lost just three sets en route to today's match, booking his place in today's showpiece finale with a 6-3 6-0 6-7 (3-7) 6-4 win over Poland's Hubert Hurkacz on Friday.

Djokovic remains on course for a sixth Wimbledon crown and his third in a row after fighting off the challenge of young Canadian Denis Shapovalov, with the 34-year-old earning a hard-fought 7-6 (7-3) 7-5 7-5 victory.

The two finalists have faced each other on two previous occasions, with Djokovic winning both match-ups, the most recent encounter coming in the quarter-finals at Roland Garros last month which saw the Serbian win within four sets on his way to claiming this year's French Open title.
Watch all the drama unfold as it happens by following our Djokovic vs Berrettini live stream guide to watch Wimbledon 2021 tennis online today.

If you're abroad during Wimbledon, you'll likely find you're unable to access your domestic tennis coverage like you would at home. This isn't necessarily cause for alarm, but rather the result of geo-blocking - best understood as digital borders that restrict certain services and content to certain parts of the world.

Fortunately, there's a convenient way around this in the form of a VPN. This is a nifty bit of software that lets you swerve around these digital borders, thereby allowing you to globe trot and still access your preferred Djokovic vs Berrettini live stream.
